text: I had several doubts when applying the
HBS you think of the prestige of Harvard
Business School you know this is you
know the top of the pyramid in terms of
Harvard Business School was one of the
biggest holes and the most ambitious
goals I've had for myself I would
probably tell my younger self that being
myself was good enough to be more secure
about my goals and ambitions and I would
say the worst they can say is no
